author: ross mcfadyen
comment: Iv installed this at 00:20 AM.  Thought to myself i need a hannibal clock face for smart watch. Searched for it and i am so happy someone has made one. Thanks. It just needs settings to take the second hand away

reply.author: Candice Louw Designs
reply.content: Thank you for the review, Ross :)  I will definitely take your suggestion into consideration!

title: This is my design

author: sumit sood
comment: Love ur theme face. But if crashes when the watch face goes dim. Fix this. Using moto 360 2nd gen.

reply.author: Candice Louw Designs
reply.content: Sorry about that!  I'm only able to dev and debug/test on Moto 360 1st gen so I don't think I will be able to fix it..... :|  I'll have a look but I can't promise anything!

title: Cool theme.... BUT.
